key_features: PLL Synthesized FM Radio, antenna, battery compartment, tuning and volume knobs, speaker grille, and ports
description: The images show a Sony ICF-M600 PLL Synthesized FM Radio in silver and black colors. The front view displays the antenna extended for radio reception, along with the model name and display screen. The back of the device shows the battery compartment open and closed. Additional images highlight the front panel with two knobs for tuning and volume control, as well as the back side with a speaker grille and some ports.
